sense.def: Illness Sign identical with luan tong 攣痛 . Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 19 ：腰背痛者，皆是腎氣虛弱，臥 冷濕當風得之。不時速治，喜流入脚膝，或為偏枯冷痹緩弱疼重。 若有 腰痛攣，脚重痹急，宜服之 , “Pain in the lumbar region and back is always brought forth by kidney qi depletion and weakness, and results from lying [with such a condition] at a cold and moist place where one is affected by wind. If this is not cured quickly in time, [the wind] will flow into the legs and knees, or it will generate unilateral withering, cold blockage, slackening, pain and a feeling of heaviness. If the lower back region is affected by pain with contraction , if the legs are heavy, with blockage and tension, it is advisable to ingest this”.
